original_text: Then he brought me into the inner court through the south gate, and he measured the south gate; it had the same measurements as the others.
korean_text: 그가 나를 데리고 그 남문을 통하여 안뜰에 들어가서 그 남문의 너비를 측량하니 크기는

sentences.original_text: Then he brought me into the inner court
and he measured the south gate
it had the same measurements as the others
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 다른 문들과 동일한 치수를 가졌습니다
